Entries.Introduction: Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my son Micah? He's interested to meet you.
Entries.dating_Maru: Yes, Micah told me the news. I can't say I'm thrilled about it, but maybe you'll prove me wrong.$u
Entries.Mon: Micah helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Maru: It's hard to do good science without Micah's help...#$b#But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.summer_Fri: $p 40#So I heard Micah had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and Micah become friends, I'm sure he'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.fall_Fri: Micah sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.#$e#I'm glad he's so dedicated.
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I'm still flabbergasted about Micah's secret robot... was it all a dream?
Entries.married_Maru: *sigh*... @, I've come to accept that it's time for my 'little boy' to become a man. You have my blessing.$s
Entries.summer_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I hope my son's keeping up on his math and science!

Entries.dating_Maru_memory_oneday: Micah's been unusually cheerful lately... I hear you may have something to do with that.
Entries.married_Maru: Congratulations on your marriage, @. Micah's already informed me that he'll continue to work at the clinic, which is a relief!

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Do I hear a leak in the roof? I'll have to check it out. I know a thing or two about carpentry from watching my mother.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I'm really starting to love this old house. It's so cozy at night.#$e#Mom's done a great job improving the place.$h
Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mom and Dad are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.fall_3: Fall aways reminds me of going out woodcutting with my mom... it might be that smell of freshly cut wood and sap.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if Micah and Dr. Harvey will ever get together? I'm sure Harvey likes her...#$e#I think Micah will have to make the first move, though.$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's really cool to have our own place. I can do whatever I feel like and not have people nagging at me all the time.#$e#I'm sure Micah's happy that I'm gone.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I hope %kid1 and %kid2 are nice to each other. Micah and I always fought as kids.#$e#If I think back on it, it was mostly my fault...
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Hey. I was just thinking about my old room in the basement. I felt comfortable there, but this is a lot more interesting. And I don't miss the smell...#$e#I felt kind of embarrassed living in my mom's house for so long.

Entries.Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm Micah. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
Entries.GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom is insisting we stay here...
Entries.GreenRain_2: This is a rare opportunity to study a unique phenomenon... every moment counts!
Entries.married_Sebastian: Hey, I guess we're brothers now!$h^Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h#$e#I'm glad that Sebastian found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
Entries.Tue: Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter.
Entries.Fri6: My Dad is very logical, and my Mom is very intuitive. That difference leads to conflict, sometimes...$s
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.

Entries.eventSeen_36_memory_oneweek: Oh, pardon this bandage on my hand...$s#$b#I went over to Micah's the other day and he showed me a new gadget of his. The darn thing charred my palm!$s
Entries.married_Maru: That was a beautiful wedding. I know Micah will make you very happy, he's a great person.
Entries.dating_Maru_memory_oneday: Hi, @. Micah told me the news... I'm happy for you two!$h

Entries.divorced_Maru: Micah was crying through the night... We're all devastated...$s
Entries.married_Maru: We'll all miss having Micah around the house, but I'm sure we'll still see her often!
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Micah likes gems. He uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Micah getting along?
Entries.cc_Complete: I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be a town hero!$h

Entries.Thu4: Why does everyone like Micah so much? Sure, he's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s
Entries.winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Micah's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.
Entries.dating_Sebastian: Don't make fun of me... but I've never been in a relationship like this before.$l^Don't make fun of me... but I've never really had a girlfriend before.$l
Entries.GreenRain: My mom's freaking out, but I'm actually kind of enjoying this. I bet the frogs are going wild out there!$h#$e#I'm gonna stay here to try and keep her calm, though.
Entries.event_city4: Ugh... You sound like my Mom.$a#$b#...*sigh*$s#$b#You're right, though. I'm addicted to these things, it's not good.$s
Entries.winter_Tue6: I was so close to screaming at Mom for throwing away my old comic collection... But something stopped me.#$e#Hmm... with age comes wisdom.

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Maru: You've really accomplished a lot since you moved here, @. It's incredible."/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 400/speak Maru "I think it's safe to say that you were meant to be a farmer!$h

Entries.ScienceHouse.2: For a gadgeteer, Micah's computer is pretty old. He's still backing up her files to floppy disk.
Entries.ScienceHouse.7: It's some kind of device Micah's working on. It looks pretty scrappy.

Entries.MarusWrench_Description: A big, metal wrench. It smells like Micah.

"/pause 1500/move Leah 0 -1 0/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "And the last one is called 'Wood Sculpture 3'.
